product_name: Pace Ritchey TR Coolmax Bike Cap - Men's
long_description: Show your support for Ritchey bicycle components: wear the blue-and-white Ritchey TR CoolMax Bike Cap from Pace. CoolMax(R) mesh fabric moves moisture away from the skin and dries fast to keep you cool. Minimalist sun visor helps keep glare out of your eyes. Elastic circular sweatband helps keeps your cap on and wicks moisture well. Graphics on the Pace Ritchey TR CoolMax Bike Cap are fully sublimated for vibrant color and sharp detail.
short_description: Show your support for Ritchey bicycle components: wear the blue-and-white Ritchey TR CoolMax Bike Cap from Pace.
